import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import Header from"./components/Header";import Banner from"./components/Banner";import Controls from"./components/Controls";import PostCard from"./components/PostCard";import Pagination from"./components/Pagination";import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const API_BASE="https://suitmedia-backend.suitdev.com/api/ideas";function App(){const[posts,setPosts]=useState([]);const[page,setPage]=useState(()=>+localStorage.getItem("page")||1);const[size,setSize]=useState(()=>+localStorage.getItem("size")||10);const[sort,setSort]=useState(()=>localStorage.getItem("sort")||"-published_at");const[total,setTotal]=useState(0);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{fetchData();},[page,size,sort]);const fetchData=async()=>{setLoading(true);// Simpan state ke localStorage agar tidak reset saat refresh

if(Array.isArray(json.data)){setPosts(json.data);}else{setPosts([]);}if(json.meta&&typeof json.meta.total==="number"){setTotal(json.meta.total);}else{setTotal(0);}}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching data:",error);setPosts([]);setTotal(0);}setLoading(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Banner,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Controls,{page:page,size:size,sort:sort,total:total,onChangePageSize:value=>{setPage(1);// reset ke halaman pertama saat ganti size
setSize(value);},onChangeSort:value=>{setPage(1);// reset ke halaman pertama saat ganti sort
setSort(value);}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"post-list",children:loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{textAlign:"center",marginTop:"2rem"},children:"Loading posts..."}):posts.length>0?posts.map((post,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PostCard,{post:post,index:index},post.id)):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{textAlign:"center",marginTop:"2rem"},children:"No posts available."})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Pagination,{page:page,total:total,size:size,onPageChange:num=>setPage(num)})]});}export default App;
